Types
TileType

The type of a tile in the map.

Animation
Animation

Represents a tile animation.

Creates a new Animation.

Parameters
frames
list[str]

A list of frame image names.

rate
int

How fast the animation plays (frames per step).

offset
int

Start delay for the animation.

loop
bool

Whether the animation loops.

Tile
Tile

A tile on the map with optional texture, animation, health, and properties.

Initializes a tile.

Parameters
type
TileType

The tile's type (see TileType).

texture
Optional[pygame.surface.Surface]

A pygame Surface representing the texture.

animation
Optional[Animation]

An optional animation for the tile see Animation.

hp
Optional[int]

Optional health for destructible tiles.

properties
Optional[dict]

A dictionary of custom properties.

self
) -> pygame.surface.Surface

Gets the tile's texture.

Returns

A pygame.Surface.

Raises

ValueError if the tile has no texture or animation.

parse_map
def parse_map(
path
: 
str
) -> list[Tile]

Loads and parses a map file (.mmmap or .mmcmap).

Parameters
path
str

Path to the map file.

Returns

A list of Tile objects.

Raises

ValueError if file format is unknown or tile count doesn't match width * height.

:

: 
Union[str, None]
 = 
None
)

Converts a .mmmap JSON map file to a .mmcmap CBOR binary.

Parameters
json_path
str

Input .mmmap file.

cbor_path
Union[str, None]

Output .mmcmap file path. If None, auto-generates path.

Raises

ValueError if input is not a .mmmap file.

=

=

) -> Tile

Gets the tile at a given world coordinate.

Parameters
player_x
int

X position in pixels.

player_y
int

Y position in pixels.

tiles
list[Tile]

List of Tile objects.

map_width
int

Width of the map in tiles.

tile_width
int

Width of one tile in pixels.

tile_height
int

Height of one tile in pixels.

Returns

A Tile object the player is currently on.

Raises

IndexError if player is outside the map bounds.

: 
int,

:

: 
int,

: 
int,
tiles
: 
list[Tile],

: 
int,
tile_size
: 
int
= 
16
) -> bool

Checks if the player is colliding with a solid tile (e.g., WALL).

Parameters
player_x
int

X position of the player.

player_y
int

Y position of the player.

player_w
int

Width of the player's bounding box.

player_h
int

Height of the player's bounding box.

tiles
list[Tile]

List of Tile objects.

map_width
int

Width of the map in tiles.

tile_size
int

Size of each square tile in pixels.

Returns

True if collision with a solid tile is detected, False otherwise.
